text: a king in whose dominions lived no less than three magicians
the other two , who were not asked to be godfathers
his trustiest counsellors to the charge of his son , who , sooner or later , in the discharge of their duty , were sure to be obliged to thwart him
not a wise man left at court
all the persons capable of guiding
a faithful and discreet adviser of my own age and sex
a young man of great ability
his dumb friend , who still remained faithful to him
The magician you have so long sought
the wise woman who brought you up
